pullRequest.title: Add non null checks to GuiUtilBase
pullRequest.bodyText:
Should fix NPE in MDITest/testCtor
https://builds.jmri.org/jenkins/job/development/job/alltest/407/testReport/junit/apps.gui3.mdi/MDITest/testCtor__/
See #9030

commit.message: Add non null checks to GuiUtilBase

nodes.bodyText:
No need for // NOI18N in either of these lines. // NOI18N is used for constant strings, like "MyTurnout".
Except that, everything looks fine.
